x86x64::VarInfoÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::VarInfo
#include <x86defs.h>

X86 variable information.

Public Functions

uint32_t getReg()

Get register type, see kRegType.

uint32_t getSize()

Get register size in bytes.

uint32_t getClass()

Get variable class, see kRegClass.

uint32_t getDesc()

Get variable description, see kVarDesc.

const char * getName()

Get variable type name.

Public Members

uint8_t _reg

Register type, see kRegType.

uint8_t _size

Register size in bytes.

uint8_t _class

Register class, see kRegClass.

uint8_t _desc

Variable flags, see kVarDesc.

char _name[4]

Variable type name.
